body_html:
Update: TF Lite now includes an option to quantized the weights in a model. You can pass --quantize_weights=true to TOCO and have the large weight tensors automatically quantized. This will affect accuracy, so be sure to check before deploying you model.

I'll close this issue. Please open separate issues if necessary.

Reference: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/lite/toco/toco_flags.proto#L176
body_text:
Update: TF Lite now includes an option to quantized the weights in a model. You can pass --quantize_weights=true to TOCO and have the large weight tensors automatically quantized. This will affect accuracy, so be sure to check before deploying you model.
I'll close this issue. Please open separate issues if necessary.
Reference: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/lite/toco/toco_flags.proto#L176
body:
Update: TF Lite now includes an option to quantized the weights in a model. You can pass --quantize_weights=true to TOCO and have the large weight tensors automatically quantized. **This will affect accuracy, so be sure to check before deploying you model.**

I'll close this issue. Please open separate issues if necessary.

Reference: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/lite/toco/toco_flags.proto#L176
